br.com.riziko.ncs.core.rules

Class ValidateSegment

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.riziko.ncs.core.rules.ValidateSegment

  • public final class ValidateSegment
extends java.lang.Object
    Validates ACODP-1, Chapter V, Segments according format Rules / It generate error when SegmentCode is null or blank, so InputHeader and OutputHeader will be skipped. It is recommended that you do test submitted segments first by using this 'isEmpty()' method.

      • isDCSN1000Structured

        public static boolean isDCSN1000Structured(SegmentBase segment,
                                           boolean natoProject)
        DOCUMENT CONTROL SERIAL NUMBER -DCSNA seven alphanumeric character number assigned to each input and output transaction for control purposes. Used internally for the NCB and externally for field activities. The first position shall not be an "A", "B", "C", or "D" unless it relates to a project where a NATO Codification Project Code (DRN 1057) has been allocated. Format 7X for All Segments

        Parameters:
        twoOne - - Segment2 - Record 1
        processingNcb - - the NCB that is processing the transaction
        Returns:
        [true] if it matches

      • isNIIN4000AccordingPrescritiveForm

        public static boolean isNIIN4000AccordingPrescritiveForm(SegmentBase segment)
        NATO ITEM IDENTIFICATION NUMBER -NIIN: A number assigned by a country to each approved item identification under the NATO Codification System. It consists of the two digit code for NCB (DRN 4130) followed by a seven digit non-significant number. Format 9N, for All except 2, 8, J.

      • isSegmentFormatValid

        public static boolean isSegmentFormatValid(java.lang.String line)
        Validates line with ACodP-1, Chapter V - Data Segments.
        Parameters:
        line -
        Returns:
        It will return false if Segment is InputHeader, OutputHeader, TCHeader or End Of Message Transmition (EOT).
